ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
libabseil:
- '20250512'
libgz_cmake:
- '5'
libgz_math:
- '9'
libgz_tools:
- '2'
libgz_utils:
- '4'
libprotobuf:
- 6.31.1
python_min:
- '3.10'
target_platform:
- linux-64
tinyxml2:
- '11.0'
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version
name: gz-msgs
raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  version: "12.0.1"
  major_version: "12"
  component_name: "msgs"
  component_version: "msgs12"
  repo_name: "gz-msgs"
  name: "gz-msgs"
  cxx_name: "libgz-msgs"
  python_name: "gz-msgs-python"
  protobuf_version: "6.31.1"
  protobuf_major_version: "6"
  next_protobuf_major_version: "7"
  build_number: 0

recipe:
  name: ${{ name }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  - url: "https://github.com/gazebosim/${{ repo_name }}/archive/${{ repo_name }}${{ major_version }}_${{ version }}.tar.gz"
    sha256: "09d3579251cc8a7806964fbf9190c596b5a62aeec5c3f9e9e41f3f5578bd0b7c"
    patches:
      - win_enable_py_tests.patch

build:
  number: ${{ build_number }}

outputs:
  - package:
      name: ${{ cxx_name }}
    build:
      script:
        - if: unix
          then: build_cxx.sh
        - if: win
          then: bld_cxx.bat
    requirements:
      ignore_run_exports:
        by_name:
          - python
          - python_abi
      build:
        - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - ${{ compiler('c') }}
        - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
        - ninja
        - cmake
        - pkg-config
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        # Cross-compiling dependencies
        - if: build_platform != target_platform
          then:
            - libgz-cmake
            - libgz-math
            - libgz-tools
            - tinyxml2
            - libabseil
            - libprotobuf
      host:
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - libgz-cmake
        - libgz-utils
        - libgz-math
        - libgz-tools
        - tinyxml2
        - libabseil
        - libprotobuf
        - if: win
          then:
            - dlfcn-win32
      run:
        - python
      run_exports:
        - ${{ pin_subpackage(cxx_name, upper_bound='x') }}

    tests:
      - script:
          - if: not win
            then:
              - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/gz/${{ component_version }}/gz/${{ component_name }}.hh
              - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/lib${{ name }}${SHLIB_EXT}
              - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/cmake/${{ name }}/${{ name }}-config.cmake
            else:
              - if not exist %PREFIX%\\Library\\include\\gz\\${{ component_version }}\\gz\\${{ component_name }}.hh exit 1
              - if not exist %PREFIX%\\Library\\lib\\${{ name }}.lib exit 1
              - if not exist %PREFIX%\\Library\\bin\\${{ name }}.dll exit 1
              - if not exist %PREFIX%\\Library\\lib\\cmake\\${{ name }}\\${{ name }}-config.cmake exit 1
  - package:
      name: ${{ python_name }}
    build:
      noarch: python
      string: protobuf${{ protobuf_major_version }}h${{ hash }}_${{ build_number }}
      script:
        - if: unix
          then: build_py.sh
        - if: win
          then: bld_py.bat
    requirements:
      build:
        - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - ${{ compiler('c') }}
        - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
        - ninja
        - cmake
        - pkg-config
        - python
        # Cross-compiling dependencies
        - if: build_platform != target_platform
          then:
            - libgz-math
            - libgz-tools
            - tinyxml2
            - libabseil
            - libprotobuf
      host:
        - libgz-math
        - libgz-tools
        - tinyxml2
        - libabseil
        - libprotobuf
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - protobuf ${{ protobuf_version }}.*
        - pytest
        - if: win
          then:
            - dlfcn-win32
      run:
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        # See https://protobuf.dev/support/cross-version-runtime-guarantee/
        - protobuf >=${{ protobuf_version }},<${{ next_protobuf_major_version }}.0a0

    tests:
      - python:
          imports:
            - gz.msgs
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}.*

  - package:
      name: ${{ name }}
    requirements:
      host:
        # Manually ensure that libabseil and libprotobuf end up in the hash
        - libabseil
        - libprotobuf
      run:
        - ${{ pin_subpackage(cxx_name, exact=true) }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage(python_name, upper_bound='x.x.x') }}
      run_exports:
        - ${{ pin_subpackage(cxx_name, upper_bound='x') }}

    tests:
      - script:
          - if: not win
            then:
              - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/gz/${{ component_version }}/gz/${{ component_name }}.hh
              - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/lib${{ name }}${SHLIB_EXT}
              - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/cmake/${{ name }}/${{ name }}-config.cmake
            else:
              - if not exist %PREFIX%\\Library\\include\\gz\\${{ component_version }}\\gz\\${{ component_name }}.hh exit 1
              - if not exist %PREFIX%\\Library\\lib\\${{ name }}.lib exit 1
              - if not exist %PREFIX%\\Library\\bin\\${{ name }}.dll exit 1
              - if not exist %PREFIX%\\Library\\lib\\cmake\\${{ name }}\\${{ name }}-config.cmake exit 1
      - python:
          imports:
            - gz.msgs
      # Regression test for https://github.com/conda-forge/gz-transport-feedstock/pull/68#issuecomment-3106484363
      # Failed with Error,  Test failed: Failed to copy test files: FileSystem error: 'Path "/var/folders/vk/nx37ffx50hv5djclhltc26vw0000gn/T/.tmpC44c2n/" already exists!'
      # disabled for now
      # - downstream: gz-transport14-python

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/gazebosim/${{ repo_name }}
  repository: https://github.com/gazebosim/${{ repo_name }}
  license: "Apache-2.0"
  license_file: "LICENSE"
  summary: "Messages for Gazebo robot simulation."

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - wolfv
    - traversaro
    - j-rivero
    - Tobias-Fischer
